DOC.HEAD: Miss Bulgaria Deported from Britain
DOC.TEXT: Miss Bulgaria was deported from Britain on Wednesday, 10 months after she arrived to begin a recording career, the Home Office said. Sonia Vassilva, 20, left London's Heathrow airport on a Bulgarian Airlines flight to the capital Sofia. Ms. Vassilva had said she feared for her safety if she was returned to Bulgaria but appeals to the Home Office were unsuccessful and she was deported on the grounds she entered the country with an illegal passport. ``We've written to all the embassies to try to get her to be taken in various countries,'' said Ms. Vassilva's London representative, Max Clifford. ``But of course if you come into one country with an illegal passport it blots your copy book.''
